title: Clovis Goods 20S1001-72MB, 69-72 W x 76 H Inch Single Sliding Frameless Shower Door with Clear Glass(NEW)
item_description:
Clovis Goods 20S1001-72MB, 69-72 W x 76 H Inch Single Sliding Frameless Shower Door with Clear Glass (NEW)

  • Specifications:
  • Material: Glass and Stainless Steel
  • Shape: Rectangle
  • Glass Thickness: 3/8 Inch
  • Number of Handles: 1
  • Weight: 196 lbs
  • Color Matte Black
  • Condition: NEW
  • Dimensions:
  • Width: 69 - 72 Inch
  • Height: 76 Inch
  • Walk Through Opening Width: 37 Inch
  • Features:
  • Model Size: 69-72 W x 76 H Inch
  • Door Walk-in: 37 Inch
  • This shower door is built to last as it is made using stainless steel hardware which can withstand the weight and is resistant to damage
  • The glass is spot, hard water and fingerprint resistant and comes with seal strip to make sure water does not leak
  • The door is customizable to your place with right or left side installation
  • The door is made using a 10 millimeters thick clear tempered glass, which is ANZI certified and has a stain and water resistant coating
  • It features special rollers to create a smooth and quiet glide

Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
